mapper.sql: id, code, session_id AS sessionId, try_times AS tryTimes, expire_time AS expireTime, create_time AS createTime, status
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO captcha_code (code, session_id, try_times, expire_time, create_time,status) VALUES (#{code},#{sessionId},0,#{expireTime},now(),1)
mapper.update: UPDATE captcha_code SET try_times = try_times + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 1
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM captcha_code WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 1
